//colocar em tela cheia se estiver habilitado a opção automática
(function() {
    'use strict';

function getCookie(name) {
    var value = "; " + document.cookie;
    var parts = value.split("; " + name + "=");
    if (parts.length == 2) return parts.pop().split(";").shift();
}

var cookieValue = getCookie("autotelacheia");
if (cookieValue) {
    var videoPlayer = document.getElementById("my-video");
    if (videoPlayer) {
        if (videoPlayer.requestFullscreen) {
            videoPlayer.requestFullscreen();
        } else if (videoPlayer.mozRequestFullScreen) {
            videoPlayer.mozRequestFullScreen();
        } else if (videoPlayer.webkitRequestFullscreen) {
            videoPlayer.webkitRequestFullscreen();
        } else if (videoPlayer.msRequestFullscreen) {
            videoPlayer.msRequestFullscreen();
        }
    }
}

})();

//elemento botão tela cheia automática
(function() {
    'use strict';

var existingButton = document.querySelector("#video-menu-1 .p-3.d-flex");
if (existingButton) {
    var newButton = existingButton.cloneNode(true);
    newButton.querySelector("div").textContent = "Tela cheia automática";
    var newToggle = newButton.querySelector("input");
    newToggle.checked = false;

    var newButtonWrapper = document.createElement("div");
    newButtonWrapper.style.display = "flex";
    newButtonWrapper.style.flexDirection = "column";
    newButtonWrapper.appendChild(newButton);

    var videoMenu = document.getElementById("video-menu-1");
    if (videoMenu) {
        videoMenu.insertAdjacentElement('afterbegin', newButtonWrapper);
    }

    newButton.querySelector("div").addEventListener("click", function() {
        newToggle.checked = !newToggle.checked;
        var date = new Date();
        if (newToggle.checked) {
            date.setTime(date.getTime() + (30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
            document.cookie = "autotelacheia=1; expires=" + date.toUTCString() + "; path=/";
        } else {
            document.cookie = "autotelacheia=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 GMT; path=/";
        }
    });
}

})();

(function() {
    'use strict';

function checkAutoplayToggle() {
    var checkbox = document.getElementById('autoplay-toggle');
    if (checkbox) {
        var cookieExists = document.cookie.split(';').some(function(cookie) {
            return cookie.trim().startsWith('autotelacheia=');
        });
        checkbox.checked = cookieExists;
    }
}

checkAutoplayToggle();

})();

//botão de baixar todos os eps
(function() {
    'use strict';

let h2Element = document.querySelector('.tEp.py-3.mb-0');

if (h2Element) {
  let button = document.createElement('button');
  button.textContent = 'Baixar todos os episódios';
  button.style.marginLeft = '10px';
  button.classList.add('mr-1', 'spanAnimeInfo', 'spanGeneros', 'spanGenerosLink');
  button.style.backgroundColor = 'transparent';
  button.style.color = 'white';
  button.style.border = 'none';
  button.style.textShadow = '0 0 2px #FF4500, 0 0 5px #FF4500, 0 0 10px #FF4500, 0 0 15px #FF4500, 0 0 20px #FF4500, 0 0 25px #FF4500';
  h2Element.appendChild(button);

  button.addEventListener('click', async function() {
    let qualityMap = { 1: 'sd', 2: 'hd', 3: 'fhd' };
    let quality = await getQuality(qualityMap);

    if (quality === null) return;
    let qualityStr = qualityMap[quality];

    let episodeLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.lEp.epT.divNumEp');

    for (let i = 0; i < episodeLinks.length; i++) {
      let link = episodeLinks[i];
      let downloadUrl = link.href.replace('/animes/', '/download/');
      try {
        let response = await fetch(downloadUrl);
        let text = await response.text();
        let parser = new DOMParser();
        let doc = parser.parseFromString(text, 'text/html');
        let downloadLink = doc.querySelector(`a[href*="${qualityStr}"]`);

        if (!downloadLink) {
          let availableQualities = Array.from(doc.querySelectorAll('a[href*="sd"], a[href*="hd"], a[href*="fhd"]'))
            .map(a => a.href.includes('sd') ? '1 - SD' : a.href.includes('hd') ? '2 - HD' : '3 - FULLHD');

          alert(`A opção de qualidade "${qualityMap[quality]}" não está disponível. Escolha entre:\n${availableQualities.join('\n')}`);
          quality = await getQuality(qualityMap, availableQualities.map(q => parseInt(q.charAt(0))));
          if (quality === null) return;
          qualityStr = qualityMap[quality];
          i--;
          continue;
        }

        window.location.href = downloadLink.href;
      } catch (error) {
        console.error(error);
      }
      await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 4000));
    }
  });

  async function getQuality(qualityMap, availableQualities = [1, 2, 3]) {
    let quality;
    do {
      quality = prompt(`Escolha uma qualidade:\n${availableQualities.map(q => `${q} - ${qualityMap[q]}`).join('\n')}`);
      if (quality === null) return null;
      quality = parseInt(quality);
    } while (!availableQualities.includes(quality));
    return quality;
  }
}

})();

//código de marcar presença
(function() {
    'use strict';

var randomDigits = Math.floor(10000 + Math.random() * 90000).toString();

var configuracoes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('configuracoes'));

if (configuracoes && configuracoes["Marcar presença"] === 'Ligado') {
    var textoMarcarPresenca = configuracoes["Texto marcar presença"];
    var currentUrl = window.location.href;

    var marcarPresenca = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('marcarpresenca')) || {};

    if (!Object.values(marcarPresenca).includes(currentUrl)) {
        if (currentUrl.includes('/animes/')) {
            var comentario = '[spoiler]' + randomDigits + '[/spoiler] ' + textoMarcarPresenca;

            fetch('https://animefire.plus/proc/cmt', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: {
                    'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
                },
                body: new URLSearchParams({
                    'texto': comentario,
                    'action': 'send_cmt'
                })
            })
            .then(function(response) {
                return response.json();
            })
            .then(function(data) {
                alert('Texto marcar presença enviado:', data);

                marcarPresenca[currentUrl] = currentUrl;
                localStorage.setItem('marcarpresenca', JSON.stringify(marcarPresenca));
            })
            .catch(function(error) {
            });
        }
    }
}

})();

//redirecionar para verificar no dc
(function() {
    'use strict';

function getCookieValue(name) {
    const value = `; ${document.cookie}`;
    const parts = value.split(`; ${name}=`);
    if (parts.length === 2) return parts.pop().split(';').shift();
    return null;
}

const vsCookieValue = parseInt(getCookieValue("vs"), 10);

if (
    (!document.cookie.includes("dcprmt") && !window.location.href.includes("?dcprmt")) &&
    (isNaN(vsCookieValue) || vsCookieValue >= 35)
) {
    alert("Você será redirecionado para o Discord para verificar se está nos servidores do AnimeFire e FireDeluxe. Se você já tiver recebido esse aviso e entrado nos servidores, apenas aperte o botão verificar novamente");
    window.location.href = "https://discord.com/channels/@me?vrfdscs";
}

})();

//definir que você já está no dc da comunidade
(function() {
    'use strict';

function checkHrefForDCPRMT() {
    var href = window.location.href;
    if (href.indexOf('?dcprmt') !== -1) {
        var expirationDate = new Date();
        expirationDate.setDate(expirationDate.getDate() + 30);
        document.cookie = 'dcprmt=1; expires=' + expirationDate.toUTCString() + '; path=/';
    }
}

checkHrefForDCPRMT();

})();

//adblocker - ainda em teste
(function() {
    'use strict';

function verificarERemoverElemento() {
    const elemento = document.getElementById('dontfoid');
    if (elemento) {
        elemento.remove();
    }
}

const observer = new MutationObserver(mutationsList => {
    for (const mutation of mutationsList) {
        if (mutation.type === 'childList') {
            verificarERemoverElemento();
        }
    }
});

const observerConfig = {
    childList: true,
    subtree: true
};

observer.observe(document.body, observerConfig);

verificarERemoverElemento();

})();

//arcoiris
(function() {
    'use strict';

function alterarCores() {
    var configuracoes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes"));
    if (configuracoes && configuracoes["Site Arco Iris"] === "Ligado") {
        var elementos = document.querySelectorAll("*");
        elementos.forEach(function(e) {
            if (e.nodeName !== "SCRIPT" && e.nodeName !== "STYLE") {
                var cor = obterCorAleatoria();
                e.style.color = cor;
            }
        });
    }
}

function obterCorAleatoria() {
    var cor = "#";
    for (var i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
        cor += "0123456789ABCDEF"[Math.floor(Math.random() * 16)];
    }
    return cor;
}

setInterval(alterarCores, 1000);

})();

//mudar tema azul
(function() {
    'use strict';

    function changeTextShadowColor() {
        var elements = document.querySelectorAll('*');
        var tema = localStorage.getItem('configuracoes');
        var configuracoes = tema ? JSON.parse(tema) : {};

        if (configuracoes.Tema === 'Azul') {
            elements.forEach(function(element) {
                var style = window.getComputedStyle(element);
                var textShadow = style.getPropertyValue('text-shadow');
                if (textShadow && (textShadow.includes('#ff4500') || textShadow.includes('rgb(255, 69, 0)'))) {
                    var newTextShadow = textShadow.replace(/#ff4500|rgb\(255,\s*69,\s*0\)/gi, '#21d3ff');
                    element.style.textShadow = newTextShadow;
                }
            });
        }
    }

    setInterval(changeTextShadowColor, 250);

})();

//CONFIGURAÇÃO!!
(function() {
    'use strict';

//configuração textarea
function adicionarConfiguracaoTextarea(nomeConfiguracao) {
    var container = document.createElement("div");

    var label = document.createElement("h1");
    label.innerHTML = nomeConfiguracao + ":";
    container.appendChild(label);

    var textarea = document.createElement("textarea");
    textarea.addEventListener("input", function() {
        var configuracoes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
        configuracoes[nomeConfiguracao] = this.value;
        localStorage.setItem("configuracoes", JSON.stringify(configuracoes));
    });

    var configuracoesSalvas = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
    if (configuracoesSalvas[nomeConfiguracao]) {
        textarea.value = configuracoesSalvas[nomeConfiguracao];
    }

    container.appendChild(textarea);
    document.body.appendChild(container);
}

//configuração upload de imagem
function adicionarConfiguracaoUploadImagem(nomeConfiguracao, chaveLocalStorage) {
    var container = document.createElement("div");

    var label = document.createElement("h1");
    label.innerHTML = nomeConfiguracao + ":";
    container.appendChild(label);

    var input = document.createElement("input");
    input.setAttribute("type", "file");
    input.addEventListener("change", function() {
        if (this.files && this.files[0]) {
            var reader = new FileReader();
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                var configuracoes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
                configuracoes[chaveLocalStorage] = e.target.result;
                localStorage.setItem("configuracoes", JSON.stringify(configuracoes));
            };
            reader.readAsDataURL(this.files[0]);
        }
    });
    container.appendChild(input);

    document.body.appendChild(container);
}

//configuração de bolinhas
function adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha(nomeConfiguracao, opcoes) {
    var container = document.createElement("div");

    var label = document.createElement("h1");
    label.innerHTML = nomeConfiguracao + ":";
    container.appendChild(label);

    for (var i = 0; i < opcoes.length; i++) {
        var input = document.createElement("input");
        input.setAttribute("type", "radio");
        input.setAttribute("name", nomeConfiguracao);
        input.setAttribute("value", opcoes[i]);
        input.addEventListener("click", function() {
            var configuracoes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
            configuracoes[nomeConfiguracao] = this.value;
            localStorage.setItem("configuracoes", JSON.stringify(configuracoes));
        });
        container.appendChild(input);

        var span = document.createElement("span");
        span.innerHTML = opcoes[i];
        container.appendChild(span);

        var configuracoesSalvas = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
        if (configuracoesSalvas[nomeConfiguracao] === opcoes[i]) {
            input.checked = true;
        }
    }

    document.body.appendChild(container);
}

//configuração barra de progresso
function adicionarConfiguracaoProgressBar(nomeConfiguracao, valorInicial, valorMaximo) {
    var container = document.createElement("div");

    var label = document.createElement("h1");
    label.innerHTML = nomeConfiguracao + ":";
    container.appendChild(label);

    var input = document.createElement("input");
    input.setAttribute("type", "range");
    input.setAttribute("name", nomeConfiguracao);
    input.setAttribute("min", 0);
    input.setAttribute("max", valorMaximo);
    input.setAttribute("value", valorInicial);
    input.addEventListener("input", function() {
        var configuracoes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
        configuracoes[nomeConfiguracao] = parseInt(this.value);
        localStorage.setItem("configuracoes", JSON.stringify(configuracoes));
    });
    container.appendChild(input);

    var configuracoesSalvas = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
    if (configuracoesSalvas[nomeConfiguracao] !== undefined) {
        input.value = configuracoesSalvas[nomeConfiguracao];
    }

    document.body.appendChild(container);
}

function adicionarBotaoSair() {
    var botao = document.createElement("button");
    botao.innerHTML = "Sair das configurações";
    botao.style.fontWeight = "bold";
    botao.style.padding = "10px 20px";
    botao.style.cursor = "pointer";
    botao.addEventListener("click", function() {
        window.close();
    });
    document.body.appendChild(botao);
}

if (window.location.href === "https://animefire.plus/?configuracao") {
    document.documentElement.innerHTML = '';

    adicionarConfiguracaoUploadImagem("Imagem Fundo Site", "Imagem Fundo Site");
    adicionarConfiguracaoUploadImagem("Imagem Fundo Chat", "Imagem Fundo Chat");
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Chat com fundo personalizado", ["Ligado", "Desligado"]);
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Site com fundo personalizado", ["Ligado", "Desligado"]);
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Block global comentários", ["Ligado", "Desligado"]);
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Block global chat", ["Ligado", "Desligado"]);
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Prévia dos eps", ["Ligado", "Desligado"]);
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Marcar presença", ["Ligado", "Desligado"]);
    adicionarConfiguracaoTextarea("Texto marcar presença");
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Tema", ["Clássico", "Azul", "Rosa"]);
    adicionarConfiguracaoBolinha("Site Arco Iris", ["Ligado", "Desligado"]);

    //adicionarConfiguracaoProgressBar("teste", 0, 100);

    adicionarBotaoSair();
}

})();

//função para deixar as imagens de próximo ep como spoiler
(function() {
    'use strict';

if (!document.querySelector('h1.section2.text-white.mx-2')) {
    const imagens = document.querySelectorAll('.card-img-top.imgAnimesUltimosEps.transitioning_src');

    imagens.forEach(imagem => {
        const eyeIcon = document.createElement('img');
        eyeIcon.src = 'https://animefire.plus/img/icons/eye.png';

        const texto = document.createElement('div');
        texto.textContent = 'Clique para revelar';
        texto.style.color = '#ffffff';
        texto.style.fontFamily = 'Arial, sans-serif';
        texto.style.fontSize = '14px';
        texto.style.marginTop = '5px';

        const overlay = document.createElement('div');
        overlay.style.position = 'absolute';
        overlay.style.top = '0';
        overlay.style.left = '0';
        overlay.style.width = '100%';
        overlay.style.height = '100%';
        overlay.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)';
        overlay.style.display = 'flex';
        overlay.style.flexDirection = 'column';
        overlay.style.justifyContent = 'center';
        overlay.style.alignItems = 'center';
        overlay.appendChild(eyeIcon);
        overlay.appendChild(texto);

        imagem.parentNode.appendChild(overlay);

        if (imagem.parentNode.tagName === 'A') {
            overlay.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
                event.preventDefault();
            });
        }

        overlay.addEventListener('click', () => {
            overlay.remove();
            imagem.style.visibility = 'visible';
            if (imagem.parentNode.tagName === 'A') {
                overlay.removeEventListener('click');
            }
        });

        imagem.style.visibility = 'hidden';
    });
}

})();

//botão de remover fundo do chat global no chat
(function() {
    'use strict';

function addRemoveBackgroundButton() {
    if (localStorage.getItem('imagemchat')) {
        createButton();
    } else {
        setTimeout(function() {
            if (localStorage.getItem('imagemchat')) {
                createButton();
            }
        }, 5000);
    }
}

function createButton() {
    var divClosePC = document.getElementById('divClosePC');
    if (!document.getElementById('removeBackgroundButton')) {
        var button = document.createElement('button');
        button.id = 'removeBackgroundButton';
        button.textContent = 'Remover Fundo';
        button.style.color = 'white';
        button.style.backgroundColor = 'transparent';
        button.style.border = 'none';
        button.style.outline = 'none';
        button.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        button.style.padding = '10px 20px';
        button.style.borderRadius = '5px';
        button.style.textShadow = '0 0 5px #FF4500, 0 0 10px #FF4500, 0 0 15px #FF4500, 0 0 20px #FF4500, 0 0 25px #FF4500';
        button.addEventListener('click', function() {
            localStorage.removeItem('imagemchat');
            document.getElementById('mainDivMSGs').style.backgroundImage = 'none';
            divClosePC.removeChild(button);
            addRemoveBackgroundButton();
        });
        divClosePC.appendChild(button);
    }
}

addRemoveBackgroundButton();

})();

(function() {
    'use strict';

if (window.location.href.includes("https://animefire")) {
  for (var i = 0; i < localStorage.length; i++) {
    var key = localStorage.key(i);
    var value = localStorage.getItem(key);
    if (key.startsWith("https://animefire") || /\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}/.test(value) || key.startsWith("together")) {
      localStorage.removeItem(key);
      i--; 
    }
  }
}

})();

(function() {

const cookieVersao = parseFloat(document.cookie.replace(/(?:(?:^|.*;\s*)vs\s*\=\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$/, "$1"));

if (!isNaN(cookieVersao)) {
    fetch('https://greasyfork.org/pt-BR/scripts/470618-firedeluxe')
        .then(response => response.text())
        .then(html => {
            const regex = /<dd class="script-show-version"><span>(\d+)<\/span><\/dd>/;
            const match = html.match(regex);
            
            if (match) {

                    window.location.href = 'https://update.greasyfork.org/scripts/470618/FireDeluxe.user.js';
                    localStorage.setItem('versao', 'incorreta');
                } else {
                    localStorage.setItem('versao', 'correta');
                }
            }
        })
}

//salvar email e senha para que o usuário recupere ou para sistema de automação
(function() {
    'use strict';

    if (window.location.href === 'https://animefire.plus/verify/index') {
        document.querySelector('button[name="login"]').addEventListener('click', function (event) {
            var email = document.querySelector('input[name="email"]').value;
            var senha = document.querySelector('input[name="senha"]').value;

            var storedData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('credentials')) || [];
            
            var emailExists = storedData.some(function (entry) {
                return entry.email === email;
            });

            if (!emailExists) {
                storedData.push({ email: email, senha: senha });
                localStorage.setItem('credentials', JSON.stringify(storedData));
            }
        });
    }

//deletar notificações do bloqueado
(function() {
    'use strict';

const notifications = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-item');

notifications.forEach(notification => {
  const imgElement = notification.querySelector('.img_cmt_noti');
  if (imgElement) {
    const src = imgElement.getAttribute('src');
    const userId = extractUserIdFromSrc(src);
    
    if (isUserBlocked(userId)) {
      notification.remove();
    }
  }
});

function extractUserIdFromSrc(src) {
  const startIndex = src.indexOf('/avatar/') + '/avatar/'.length;
  const endIndex = src.indexOf('/large');
  return src.substring(startIndex, endIndex);
}

function isUserBlocked(userId) {
  const blockedUsers = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('blockpersonalizado')) || [];
  return blockedUsers.some(user => user.link.includes(`/users/${userId}`));
}

})();

//remover perfis duplicados no sistema de bloquear
(function() {
    'use strict';

const blockPersonalizadoJson = localStorage.getItem('blockpersonalizado');
let blockPersonalizadoArray = [];

if (blockPersonalizadoJson) {
  try {
    
    blockPersonalizadoArray = JSON.parse(blockPersonalizadoJson);

    const linkSet = new Set();
    const uniqueBlockPersonalizadoArray = blockPersonalizadoArray.filter(item => {
      const link = item.link;
      if (!linkSet.has(link)) {
        linkSet.add(link);
        return true;
      }
      return false;
    });

    if (uniqueBlockPersonalizadoArray.length !== blockPersonalizadoArray.length) {
      localStorage.setItem('blockpersonalizado', JSON.stringify(uniqueBlockPersonalizadoArray));
    }

  } catch (error) {

  }
} else {
}

})();

//registrar tempo gasto no site
(function() {
    'use strict';

let startTime;

function startTimer() {
  startTime = new Date();
}

function saveAndSumTimeSpent() {
  if (startTime) {
    const endTime = new Date();
    const timeSpent = endTime - startTime;

    const secondsSpent = Math.floor(timeSpent / 1000);

    const storedTimeJSON = localStorage.getItem('tempoGastoJSON');
    const storedTime = storedTimeJSON ? JSON.parse(storedTimeJSON) : {};

    storedTime.segundos = (storedTime.segundos || 0) + secondsSpent;

    if (storedTime.segundos >= 60) {
      storedTime.minutos = (storedTime.minutos || 0) + Math.floor(storedTime.segundos / 60);
      storedTime.segundos = storedTime.segundos % 60;
    }
    if (storedTime.minutos >= 60) {
      storedTime.horas = (storedTime.horas || 0) + Math.floor(storedTime.minutos / 60);
      storedTime.minutos = storedTime.minutos % 60;
    }
    if (storedTime.horas >= 24) {
      storedTime.dias = (storedTime.dias || 0) + Math.floor(storedTime.horas / 24);
      storedTime.horas = storedTime.horas % 24;
    }
    if (storedTime.dias >= 30) {
      storedTime.meses = (storedTime.meses || 0) + Math.floor(storedTime.dias / 30);
      storedTime.dias = storedTime.dias % 30;
    }

    localStorage.setItem('tempoGastoJSON', JSON.stringify(storedTime));

    startTime = null;
  }
}

window.addEventListener('load', startTimer);

window.addEventListener('beforeunload', saveAndSumTimeSpent);

})();

(function() {
  'use strict';

  if (window.location.href === "https://animefire.plus/verify/index") {
    const originalButton = document.querySelector('.button[name="login"]');
  
    if (originalButton) {
const duplicateButton = originalButton.cloneNode(true);
duplicateButton.textContent = "Entrar Automaticamente";
duplicateButton.style.fontSize = "1.5em";
duplicateButton.style.color = "#FFFFFF";
duplicateButton.style.textShadow = "0 0 2px #FF4500, 0 0 5px #FF4500, 0 0 10px #FF4500, 0 0 15px #FF4500, 0 0 20px #FF4500, 0 0 25px #FF4500"; // Sombra de texto
originalButton.parentNode.appendChild(duplicateButton);


      duplicateButton.addEventListener("click", function() {
        fetch('https://animefire.plus/verify/index')
          .then(response => response.text())
          .then(html => {
            const parser = new DOMParser();
            const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
            const csrfValue = doc.querySelector('input[name="csrf_token"]').getAttribute('value');

            const contaOriginalData = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("contaoriginal"));

            if (contaOriginalData && contaOriginalData.email && contaOriginalData.senha) {
              const email = contaOriginalData.email;
              const senha = contaOriginalData.senha;

              fetch('https://animefire.plus/auth/entrar', {
                method: 'POST',
                headers: {
                  'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'
                },
                body: `email=${email}&senha=${senha}&csrf_token=${csrfValue}&login=`
              })
              .then(response => {
                if (response.ok) {
                  window.location.href = "https://animefire.plus/";
                } else {
                  throw new Error('Falha ao entrar automaticamente');
                }
              })
              .catch(error => {
                alert(error.message);
              });
            } else {
              alert("Você precisa registrar sua conta automática no MENU para usar essa função e outras.");
            }
          })
      });
    }
  }

//Enviar imagens no chat jogando elas
(function() {
  'use strict';

var divMsgsPc = document.getElementById('div_msgs_pc');

divMsgsPc.addEventListener('dragover', function (e) {
  e.preventDefault();
  divMsgsPc.style.border = '10px dashed #ccc';
  divMsgsPc.style.zIndex = '9999';
});

divMsgsPc.addEventListener('dragleave', function () {
  divMsgsPc.style.border = 'none';
});

divMsgsPc.addEventListener('drop', function (e) {
  e.preventDefault();
  divMsgsPc.style.border = 'none';

  var files = e.dataTransfer.files;
  if (files.length > 0) {
    var file = files[0];

    var formData = new FormData();
    formData.append('cmt_share_img', file);

    fetch('https://animefire.plus/proc/cmt', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: formData,
    })
    .then(response => response.json())
    .then(data => {
      var imageUrl = data.url.replace(/\\/g, '');

      document.getElementById('textAreaPC').value = '[img]' + imageUrl + '[img]';
      document.getElementById('btnEnviarPchat').click();
    })
  }
});

divMsgsPc.addEventListener('mouseenter', function () {
  divMsgsPc.style.zIndex = '9999';
});

divMsgsPc.addEventListener('mouseleave', function (e) {
  if (!divMsgsPc.classList.contains('dragging') && !e.relatedTarget.classList.contains('dragging')) {
    divMsgsPc.style.zIndex = 'initial';
  }
});

})();

(function() {
  'use strict'

function obterNomeDoAnime() {
    var url = window.location.href;
    var partesDaURL = url.split('/');
    var nomeDoAnime = partesDaURL[partesDaURL.length - 2];
    return nomeDoAnime;
}

function pularIntro() {
    var video = document.getElementById('my-video_html5_api');
    if (video) {
        var tempoAtual = video.currentTime;
        video.currentTime = tempoAtual + 85;
    }
}

function adicionarBotaoPularIntro() {
    var barraDeControle = document.querySelector('.vjs-control-bar');
    if (barraDeControle) {
        var botaoPularIntro = document.createElement('button');
        botaoPularIntro.id = 'botaoPularIntro';
        botaoPularIntro.className = 'vjs-control vjs-button'; 
        botaoPularIntro.innerText = 'Pular Abertura (Deluxe)';
        botaoPularIntro.style.zIndex = '1';
        botaoPularIntro.style.fontSize = 'larger';
        botaoPularIntro.addEventListener('click', function() {
            pularIntro();
        });

        barraDeControle.appendChild(botaoPularIntro);
    }

    var barraDeProgresso = document.querySelector('.ytp-progress-bar');
    if (barraDeProgresso) {
        barraDeProgresso.addEventListener('click', function() {
            pularIntro();
        });
    }
}

if (window.location.href.includes('/animes/')) {
    setInterval(function() {
        if (!document.getElementById('botaoPularIntro')) {
            adicionarBotaoPularIntro();
        }

}

})();

//filtro xingamentos
(function() {
  'use strict'

const xingamentos = ["fodase", "pica", "caralho", "merda", "porra", "puta", "foda", "cu", "buceta", "viado", "arrombado", "filho da puta", "cacete", "cuzão", "babaca", "retardado", "chupa", "chup", "pinto", "chup", "penis", "pênis", "desgraçado", "desgracado", "imbecil", "hentai", "porn", "pornografia", "discord", "corno", "x0t4", "xota", "xereca", "pau", "ku", "vsfd", "tmnc", "bct", "corno", "vadia", "fuder"];

const alfabetoCustomizado = {
  'a': '𝖠',
  'b': '𝖡',
  'c': '𝖢',
  'd': '𝖣',
  'e': '𝖤',
  'f': '𝖥',
  'g': '𝖦',
  'h': '𝖧',
  'i': '𝖨',
  'j': '𝖩',
  'k': '𝖪',
  'l': '𝖫',
  'm': '𝖬',
  'n': '𝖭',
  'o': '𝖮',
  'p': '𝖯',
  'q': '𝖰',
  'r': '𝖱',
  's': '𝖲',
  't': '𝖳',
  'u': '𝖴',
  'v': '𝖵',
  'w': '𝖶',
  'x': '𝖷',
  'y': '𝖸',
  'z': '𝖹'
};

const textArea = document.getElementById('textAreaPC');

textArea.addEventListener('input', function() {
  const texto = this.value;
  const palavras = texto.split(' ');

  const textoModificado = palavras.map(palavra => {
    if (palavra.startsWith('[citar]') && palavra.endsWith('[citar]')) {
      return palavra;
    } else {
      const palavraLimpa = palavra.replace(/[^\w\s]/g, '');
      if (xingamentos.includes(palavraLimpa.toLowerCase())) {
        const palavraModificada = palavraLimpa.split('').map(letra => {
          return alfabetoCustomizado[letra.toLowerCase()] || letra;
        }).join('');
        return palavra.replace(palavraLimpa, palavraModificada);
      } else {
        return palavra;
      }
    }
  }).join(' ');

  this.value = textoModificado;
});

})();

(function() {
    'use strict';

    let ultimasMensagens = [];

    function verificarUltimasMensagens() {
        const mensagens = $(".divMSGs");

        if (mensagens.length >= 4) {
            const perfis = [
                mensagens.eq(-1).find('input[name="profile_url"]').val(),
                mensagens.eq(-2).find('input[name="profile_url"]').val(),
                mensagens.eq(-3).find('input[name="profile_url"]').val(),
                mensagens.eq(-4).find('input[name="profile_url"]').val(),
            ];

            if (perfis.every((perfil, index) => perfil === perfis[0])) {
                const contaAltJSON = localStorage.getItem("contaalt");
                const contaOriginalJSON = localStorage.getItem("contaoriginal");

                if (contaAltJSON && contaOriginalJSON) {
                    ultimasMensagens.push(perfis[0]);

                    if (ultimasMensagens.length === 4 && ultimasMensagens.every((perfil) => perfil === perfis[0])) {
                        ultimasMensagens = [];

                        const contaAlt = JSON.parse(contaAltJSON);
                        const contaOriginal = JSON.parse(contaOriginalJSON);

                        const email = contaAlt.email;
                        const senha = contaAlt.senha;
                        const novoEmail = contaOriginal.email;

                        fetch('https://animefire.plus/verify/index')
                            .then(response => response.text())
                            .then(html => {
                                const parser = new DOMParser();
                                const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
                                const csrfValue = doc.querySelector('input[name="csrf_token"]').getAttribute('value');

                                $.ajax({
                                    url: "https://animefire.plus/auth/entrar",

                                    data: {

                                        csrf_token: csrfValue,

                                    },
                                    success: function (response) {
                                        $.ajax({

                                            type: "POST",

                                                websocket.onopen = () => {

                                                };

                                                };

                                                $.ajax({

                                                    data: {
                                                        email: novoEmail,
                                                        senha: novaSenha,
                                                        csrf_token: csrfValue,
                                                        login: ""
                                                    },
                                                    success: function (response) {
                                                    }
                                                });
                                            }
                                        });
                                    }
                                });
                            })
                    }
                } else {
                }
            } else {
            }
        }
    }

    setInterval(verificarUltimasMensagens, 1000);

})();

//dados do anime ao passar mouse encima
(function() {
  'use strict';

setInterval(function() {
  const divArticles = document.querySelectorAll('.divArticleLancamentos a.item');
  divArticles.forEach(function(divArticle) {
    const overlay = divArticle.querySelector('.overlay');
    if (overlay && !isMouseOverElement(divArticle)) {
      overlay.remove();
    }
  });
}, 1000);

function isMouseOverElement(element) {
  const rect = element.getBoundingClientRect();
  const mouseX = event.clientX;
  const mouseY = event.clientY;

  return (
    mouseX >= rect.left &&
    mouseX <= rect.right &&
    mouseY >= rect.top &&
    mouseY <= rect.bottom
  );
}

document.addEventListener('mousemove', function(event) {
  const divArticles = document.querySelectorAll('.divArticleLancamentos a.item');
  divArticles.forEach(function(divArticle) {
    const overlay = divArticle.querySelector('.overlay');
    if (overlay && !isMouseOverElement(divArticle)) {
      overlay.remove();
    }
  });
});

})();

(function() {
  'use strict';

const elementosComFetchEnviado = new Set();

function criarOverlay(elemento, numeroEpisodios, estudio, diaLancamento, temporada) {
  let overlay = elemento.querySelector(".overlay");
  if (!overlay) {
    overlay = document.createElement("div");
    overlay.classList.add("overlay");

    overlay.style.position = "absolute";
    overlay.style.top = "0";
    overlay.style.left = "0";
    overlay.style.width = "100%";
    overlay.style.height = "100%";
    overlay.style.backgroundColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)";
    overlay.style.color = "#fff";
    overlay.style.textAlign = "center";
    overlay.style.padding = "10px";
    elemento.appendChild(overlay);
  }

  overlay.innerHTML = `
    <p>Episódios: ${numeroEpisodios}</p>
    <p>Estúdio: ${estudio}</p>
    <p>Dia de Lançamento: ${diaLancamento}</p>
    <p>Temporada: ${temporada}</p>
  `;
}

function fazerFetch(event) {
  const elemento = event.target.closest(".divArticleLancamentos a.item");

  if (elemento && !elementosComFetchEnviado.has(elemento)) {
    elementosComFetchEnviado.add(elemento);

    const href = elemento.getAttribute("href");

    fetch(href)
      .then(response => {
        if (response.ok) {
          return response.text();
        } else {
          throw new Error("Falha ao buscar o recurso.");
        }
      })
      .then(data => {
        const parser = new DOMParser();
        const doc = parser.parseFromString(data, "text/html");

        const episodios = doc.querySelectorAll(".div_video_list a.lEp");
        const numeroEpisodios = episodios.length;

        const infos = doc.querySelectorAll(".animeInfo");
        let estudio = "Desconhecido";
        let diaLancamento = "Desconhecido";
        let temporada = "Desconhecida";

        infos.forEach(info => {
          const textoInfo = info.textContent.trim();
          if (textoInfo.includes("Estúdios:")) {
            estudio = info.querySelector(".spanAnimeInfo").textContent.trim();
          }
          if (textoInfo.includes("Dia de Lançamento:")) {
            diaLancamento = info.querySelector(".spanAnimeInfo").textContent.trim();
          }
          if (textoInfo.includes("Temporada:")) {
            temporada = info.querySelector(".spanAnimeInfo").textContent.trim();
          }
        });

        criarOverlay(elemento, numeroEpisodios, estudio, diaLancamento, temporada);
      })
      .catch(error => {
        console.error(error);
      });
  }
}

document.querySelectorAll(".divArticleLancamentos a.item").forEach(elemento => {
  elemento.addEventListener("mouseover", fazerFetch);
  elemento.addEventListener("mouseout", () => {
    elementosComFetchEnviado.delete(elemento);
  });
});

 })();

//carregar video na imagem dos ultimos eps quando o mouse passar por cima //prévia do anime
(function() {
  'use strict';

const configuracoes = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('configuracoes'));

if (configuracoes && configuracoes["Prévia dos eps"] === "Ligado") {
  let videoElements = new Map();
  let timerIds = new Map();

  function loadVideoOnHover(event) {
    const cardElement = event.currentTarget;
    if (!videoElements.has(cardElement)) {
      const timerId = setTimeout(() => {
        fetchVideo(cardElement);
      }, 6000);
      timerIds.set(cardElement, timerId);
    }
  }

  function cancelLoadVideo(event) {
    const cardElement = event.currentTarget;
    const timerId = timerIds.get(cardElement);
    if (timerId) {
      clearTimeout(timerId);
    }
  }

  async function fetchVideo(cardElement) {
    if (videoElements.has(cardElement)) {
      return;
    }

    const linkElement = cardElement.querySelector('a');
    const link = linkElement.getAttribute('href');

    try {
      const response = await fetch(link);
      const htmlText = await response.text();

      const videoSrcMatch = htmlText.match(/<video.*src="(.*?)"/);
      if (videoSrcMatch) {
        const videoPageLink = videoSrcMatch[1];

        const videoResponse = await fetch(videoPageLink);
        const videoData = await videoResponse.json();
        const firstSrc = videoData.data[0].src;

        const videoElement = document.createElement('video');
        videoElement.className = 'card-img-top imgAnimesUltimosEps transitioning_src';
        videoElement.src = firstSrc;
        videoElement.controls = false;
        videoElement.autoplay = true;
        videoElement.muted = true;
        videoElement.controlsList = 'nodownload';

        const imgElement = cardElement.querySelector('img');
        imgElement.parentNode.replaceChild(videoElement, imgElement);

        videoElements.set(cardElement, videoElement);

        videoElement.addEventListener('loadedmetadata', () => {
          setTimeout(() => {
            videoElement.pause();
          }, 60000);
        });

        videoElement.addEventListener('mouseover', () => {
          videoElement.play();
        });

      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error(error);
    }
  }

  const cardElements = document.querySelectorAll('.divCardUltimosEpsHome');
  cardElements.forEach((cardElement) => {
    cardElement.addEventListener('mouseover', loadVideoOnHover);
    cardElement.addEventListener('mouseleave', cancelLoadVideo);
  });
}

})();

//suporte para lanternaon e lanternaoff + codigo de lanterna
(function() {
  'use strict';

const isDesktop = /Mac|Windows|Linux/.test(navigator.userAgent);

function applyDistortion() {
    if (!document.querySelector('.distortion-layer')) {
        const distortionLayer = document.createElement('div');
        distortionLayer.className = 'distortion-layer';
        distortionLayer.style.position = 'fixed';
        distortionLayer.style.top = '0';
        distortionLayer.style.left = '0';
        distortionLayer.style.width = '100%';
        distortionLayer.style.height = '100%';
        distortionLayer.style.pointerEvents = 'none';
        distortionLayer.style.background = 'linear-gradient(transparent, transparent)';
        distortionLayer.style.zIndex = '9999';
        document.body.appendChild(distortionLayer);

        document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
            const mouseX = e.clientX;
            const mouseY = e.clientY;

            const distortionStrength = 20;
            const translateX = (mouseX - window.innerWidth / 2) / window.innerWidth * distortionStrength;
            const translateY = (mouseY - window.innerHeight / 2) / window.innerHeight * distortionStrength;

            distortionLayer.style.background = `radial-gradient(circle at ${mouseX}px ${mouseY}px, transparent 100px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) 150px)`;
            distortionLayer.style.transform = `translate(-${translateX}px, -${translateY}px)`;
        });
    }
}

function removeDistortion() {
    const distortionLayer = document.querySelector('.distortion-layer');
    if (distortionLayer) {
        document.body.removeChild(distortionLayer);
    }
}

function handleStorageChange(event) {
    if (event.key === 'lanterna') {
        if (event.newValue === 'on') {
            applyDistortion();
        } else {
            removeDistortion();
        }
    }
}

window.addEventListener('storage', handleStorageChange);

const lanternStatus = localStorage.getItem('lanterna');
if (lanternStatus === 'on') {
    applyDistortion();
}
})();

function checkMeuPerfil() {
  const aprovadosCookie = document.cookie.replace(/(?:(?:^|.*;\s*)aprovados\s*\=\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$/, '$1');
  const aprovados = aprovadosCookie.split(' ');
  const meuPerfilLink = document.querySelector('a.dropdown-item.py-2.px-4.meu-perfil');
  const fetchButton = document.getElementById('fetchButton');

  if (meuPerfilLink && !fetchButton) {
    if (aprovados.includes(meuPerfilLink.getAttribute('href'))) {
      const umDiaEmSegundos = 24 * 60 * 60;
      document.cookie = `prmt=true; max-age=${umDiaEmSegundos}; path=/`;
    } else {
      document.cookie = 'prmt=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
    }
  }
}

  function deletePrmtCookie() {
    const dropdownLink = document.querySelector('a.dropdown-item.py-2.px-4.meu-perfil');
    const aprovadosCookie = document.cookie.replace(/(?:(?:^|.*;\s*)aprovados\s*\=\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$/, '$1');
    const aprovados = aprovadosCookie.split(' ');

    if (!dropdownLink || !aprovados.includes(dropdownLink.getAttribute('href'))) {
      document.cookie = 'prmt=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;';
    }
  }

  setInterval(checkMeuPerfil, 2000);
  deletePrmtCookie();

})();

(function() {
  'use strict';

  function removeDuplicateCookies(cookieName) {
    const cookies = document.cookie.split(';');
    const cookieValues = new Set();

    cookies.forEach(cookie => {
      const trimmedCookie = cookie.trim();
      if (trimmedCookie.indexOf(cookieName) === 0) {
        const cookieValue = trimmedCookie.substring(cookieName.length + 1);
        if (cookieValues.has(cookieValue)) {
          document.cookie = `${trimmedCookie}; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;`;
        } else {
          cookieValues.add(cookieValue);
        }
      }
    });
  }

  function checkCookies() {
    removeDuplicateCookies('block');
    removeDuplicateCookies('aprovados');
  }

  setInterval(checkCookies, 1000);
})();

    document.cookie = cname + "=" + cvalue + ";path=/";
  }

  function getCookie(cname) {
    let name = cname + "=";
    let decodedCookie = decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);
    let ca = decodedCookie.split(';');
    for (let i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
      let c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') {
        c = c.substring(1);
      }
      if (c.indexOf(name) == 0) {
        return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
      }
    }
    return "";
  }

function handleClicksiteleve() {

const newHTML = `

<html lang="en">

<button id="closeAnimeListButton" class="hidden">Fechar Últimos Animes</button>

<div id="videoContainer"></div>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
  const fetchButton = document.getElementById("fetchButton");
  const chatButton = document.getElementById("chatButton");
  const closeAnimeListButton = document.getElementById("closeAnimeListButton");
  const animeList = document.getElementById("animeList");
  const videoContainer = document.getElementById("videoContainer");

  fetchButton.addEventListener("click", async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetch("https://animefire.plus/");
      const htmlContent = await response.text();
      const parser = new DOMParser();
      const doc = parser.parseFromString(htmlContent, "text/html");

      const animeContainers = doc.querySelectorAll(".divCardUltimosEpsHome");
      
      animeList.innerHTML = "";
      closeAnimeListButton.classList.remove("hidden");
      
      animeContainers.forEach(animeContainer => {
        const animeName = animeContainer.querySelector(".animeTitle").textContent;
        const animeLink = animeContainer.querySelector("a").getAttribute("href");

const animeElement = document.createElement("div");
animeElement.innerHTML = 
  '<h3>' + animeName + '</h3>' +
  '<p>Link: <a href="' + animeLink + '" target="_blank">' + animeLink + '</a></p>' +
  '<button class="watchButton" data-link="' + animeLink + '">Assistir</button>' +
  '<hr>';

        
        animeList.appendChild(animeElement);
      });

      const watchButtons = document.querySelectorAll(".watchButton");
      watchButtons.forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener("click", async () => {
          const link = button.getAttribute("data-link");
          const watchResponse = await fetch(link);
          const watchHtmlContent = await watchResponse.text();

          const videoSrcMatch = watchHtmlContent.match(/data-video-src="([^"]+)"/);
          if (videoSrcMatch) {
            const videoSrc = videoSrcMatch[1];
            const videoResponse = await fetch(videoSrc);
            const videoDetails = await videoResponse.json();

            if (videoDetails.data && videoDetails.data.length > 0) {
              const lightspeedLink = videoDetails.data[0].src;
              
              const videoPlayer = document.createElement("video");
              videoPlayer.controls = true;
              videoPlayer.src = lightspeedLink;
              videoPlayer.setAttribute("playsinline", true);
              videoPlayer.style.width = "100%"; 
              videoPlayer.style.height = "auto";

              const closeButton = document.createElement("button");
              closeButton.textContent = "Fechar Vídeo";
              closeButton.addEventListener("click", () => {
                videoContainer.innerHTML = ""; 
                animeList.classList.remove("hidden"); 
                closeAnimeListButton.classList.remove("hidden"); 
              });

              videoContainer.innerHTML = ""; 
              videoContainer.appendChild(videoPlayer);
              videoContainer.appendChild(closeButton);

              animeList.classList.add("hidden");
              closeAnimeListButton.classList.add("hidden"); 
            } else {
              console.log("Lightspeed link not found.");
            }
          } else {
            console.log("Video source not found.");
          }
        });
      });

       closeAnimeListButton.addEventListener("click", () => {
        animeList.innerHTML = ""; 
        closeAnimeListButton.classList.add("hidden"); 
      });

    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Error fetching data:", error);
    }
  });

  chatButton.addEventListener("click", async () => {
    try {
      const data = {
        action: 'load',
        type: 'public'
      };

      const formData = new URLSearchParams();
      for (const key in data) {
        formData.append(key, data[key]);
      }

      const chatResponse = await fetch('https://animefire.plus/proc/chat', {
        method: 'POST',
        body: formData
      });

      if (chatResponse.ok) {
        const chatData = await chatResponse.json();

        animeList.innerHTML = ""; 
        
        const chatContainer = document.createElement("div");
        chatContainer.classList.add("chatContainer");

       chatData.forEach(message => {
  const chatContainer = document.createElement("div");
  chatContainer.classList.add("chatContainer");

  const chatMessage = document.createElement("div");
  chatMessage.classList.add("chatMessage");

  const [hour, minute] = message.data.split(":");

  const formattedTime = hour + ':' + minute;

chatMessage.innerHTML = 
    '<div class="message">' +
      '<div class="avatar"><img src="https://animefire.plus/' + message.avatar + '" alt="Avatar"></div>' +
      '<div class="username">' + message.username + '</div>' +
      '<div class="text">' + message.texto + '</div>' +
      '<div class="time">' + formattedTime + '</div>' +
    '</div>';

  chatContainer.appendChild(chatMessage);

  const line = document.createElement("hr");
  chatContainer.appendChild(line); 
  animeList.appendChild(chatContainer);
});
        animeList.appendChild(chatContainer);
      } else {

      }
    } catch (error) {

    }
  });
});
</script>
</body>
</html>

`;
document.open();

document.close();

}

        var userLink = textarea.value;

        if (userLink.includes('https://animefire.plus/users/')) {
            fetch(userLink)

                .then(data => {

function desbloquearUsuario(link) {
    var blockList = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('blockpersonalizado')) || [];

function switchBackgroundInput() {
  let input = document.createElement('input');
  input.type = 'file';
  input.accept = 'image/*';
  input.addEventListener('change', handleFileUpload);
  input.click();
}

function handleFileUpload(event) {
  const file = event.target.files[0];
  if (file) {
    const reader = new FileReader();

    reader.onload = function () {
      const imageUrl = reader.result;
      applyBackgroundImage(imageUrl);
      saveImageToLocalStorage(imageUrl);
    };

    reader.readAsDataURL(file);
  }
}

function applyBackgroundImage(imageUrl) {
  document.body.style.backgroundImage = `url('${imageUrl}')`;
  document.body.style.backgroundSize = 'cover';
}

function saveImageToLocalStorage(imageUrl) {
  localStorage.setItem('imagemfundosite', imageUrl);
}

//botão pedido de amizade comentários
(function() {
  'use strict';

function aplicarBotaoSolicitacaoAmizade(elementoComentario, idUsuario) {
    const elementoLinkUsuario = elementoComentario.querySelector('.usr_name_cmt');
    const elementoLinkPerfil = elementoComentario.querySelector('.us_reply');

    if (elementoLinkUsuario) {
        const urlUsuario = elementoLinkUsuario.href;

        const botaoSolicitarAmizade = document.createElement('button');
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.innerHTML = '<img src="https://animefire.plus/img/icons/profile_icon.png" alt="Enviar Pedido de Amizade">';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.style.background = 'transparent';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.style.color = '#FF4500';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.style.border = 'none';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.style.outline = 'none';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.style.cursor = 'pointer';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.style.marginLeft = '5px';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.style.textShadow = '0 0 2px #FF4500, 0 0 5px #FF4500';
        botaoSolicitarAmizade.addEventListener('click', () => {
            fetch(urlUsuario)
                .then(response => response.text())
                .then(html => {
                    const parser = new DOMParser();
                    const doc = parser.parseFromString(html, 'text/html');
                    const csrfValue = doc.getElementById('dd_guest_actions_token').getAttribute('data-csrf');
                    enviarSolicitacaoAmizade(idUsuario, csrfValue);
                })
                .catch(error => console.error('Ocorreu um erro:', error));
        });

        const botaoExistente = elementoComentario.querySelector('.botao-solicitar-amizade');
        if (!botaoExistente) {
            const divDflex = elementoComentario.querySelector('.d-flex');
            if (divDflex) {
                divDflex.appendChild(botaoSolicitarAmizade);
                botaoSolicitarAmizade.classList.add('botao-solicitar-amizade');
            }
        }
    }
}

function verificarNovosComentarios() {
    const elementosComentario = document.querySelectorAll('.cmt');
    elementosComentario.forEach(elementoComentario => {
        const elementoLinkUsuario = elementoComentario.querySelector('.usr_name_cmt');
        if (elementoLinkUsuario) {
            const urlUsuario = elementoLinkUsuario.href;
            const correspondenciaIdUsuario = urlUsuario.match(/\/users\/(\d+)/);

            if (correspondenciaIdUsuario && correspondenciaIdUsuario.length >= 2) {
                const idUsuario = correspondenciaIdUsuario[1];
                aplicarBotaoSolicitacaoAmizade(elementoComentario, idUsuario);
            }
        }
    });
}

verificarNovosComentarios();
setInterval(verificarNovosComentarios, 3000);

function enviarSolicitacaoAmizade(id, csrfToken) {
    $.ajax({
        url: site_url + "/edit/friend",
        type: "post",
        data: {
            action: "send_friend_request",
            id: id,
            dd_guest_actions_token: csrfToken
        },
        success: function(response) {
            alert('Pedido de amizade enviado');
        },
        error: function() {
            alert('Falha');
        }
    });
}

(function() {
    'use strict';

function checkProfile() {
  if (window.location.href.indexOf('https://animefire.plus/verify/index') === -1) {
    var approvedUsers = localStorage.getItem('aprovados');
    if (!approvedUsers) return;

    var currentUser = localStorage.getItem('linkusuario');

    var approvedUsersArray = JSON.parse(approvedUsers);

    if (!approvedUsersArray.includes(currentUser)) {
      createOverlay();
    }
  }
}

function createOverlay() {
  var overlay = document.createElement('div');
  overlay.style.position = 'fixed';
  overlay.style.top = '0';
  overlay.style.left = '0';
  overlay.style.width = '100%';
  overlay.style.height = '100%';
  overlay.style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)';
  overlay.style.zIndex = '9999';
  overlay.style.color = 'white';
  overlay.style.display = 'flex';
  overlay.style.flexDirection = 'column';
  overlay.style.alignItems = 'center';
  overlay.style.justifyContent = 'center';

  var message = document.createElement('div');
  message.style.textAlign = 'center';
  message.style.padding = '20px';
  message.innerHTML = 'Você não pode utilizar o FireDeluxe sem permissão';

  overlay.appendChild(message);
  document.body.appendChild(overlay);
}

setInterval(checkProfile, 10000);

})();

// bloqueador de perfis / comentários e reply de comentários
(function() {
    'use strict';

    function blockComments() {
        let blockedCommentsCount = 0;

        setInterval(() => {
            const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("configuracoes")) || {};
            if (settings["Block global comentários"] !== "Ligado") return;

            const blockedProfiles = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("block")) || [];
            const replyDivs = document.querySelectorAll(".cmt_reply_div");
            const commentDivs = document.querySelectorAll(".cmt.d-flex.mb-3");

            replyDivs.forEach(div => {
                const link = div.querySelector("a").href;
                if (blockedProfiles.includes(link)) {
                    div.remove();
                    blockedCommentsCount++;
                }
            });

            commentDivs.forEach(div => {
                const link = div.querySelector("a").href;
                if (blockedProfiles.includes(link)) {
                    div.remove();
                    blockedCommentsCount++;
                }
            });

            const cmtCountElement = document.querySelector("#cmt_count");
            if (cmtCountElement) {
                const blockedCommentsText = document.querySelector("#blocked_comments_text");
                if (blockedCommentsText) {
                    blockedCommentsText.textContent = `${blockedCommentsCount} Comentários bloqueados pelo FireDeluxe`;
                } else {
                    const blockedCommentsText = document.createElement("h6");
                    blockedCommentsText.id = "blocked_comments_text";
                    blockedCommentsText.className = "quicksand400 text-white";
                    blockedCommentsText.style.color = "red";
                    blockedCommentsText.textContent = `${blockedCommentsCount} Comentários bloqueados pelo FireDeluxe`;
                    cmtCountElement.parentNode.appendChild(blockedCommentsText);
                }
            }
        }, 500);
    }

    blockComments();
})();

function aplicarEfeitoNeon(elemento, cor) {
  elemento.style.color = cor;
  elemento.style.fontWeight = "bold";
  elemento.style.textShadow = `0 0 10px ${cor}, 0 0 20px ${cor}, 0 0 30px ${cor}`;
}

function aplicarEfeitoNeonEmLinks() {
  const elementosLinks = document.querySelectorAll('a');

  elementosLinks.forEach(link => {
    const href = link.getAttribute("href");
    if (nomesCores[href]) {
      aplicarEfeitoNeon(link, coresRGB[nomesCores[href]]);
    }
  });
}

function aplicarEfeitoNeonNoElemento() {
  const elemento = document.getElementById("checkUserName");
  if (elemento) {
    const texto = elemento.textContent.trim();
    for (const nome in nomesCores) {
      if (texto.includes(nome)) {
        const corNome = nomesCores[nome];
        const corRGB = coresRGB[corNome];
        aplicarEfeitoNeon(elemento, corRGB);
        break;
      }
    }
  }
}

function changeColors() {
  aplicarEfeitoNeonEmLinks();
  aplicarEfeitoNeonNoElemento();
}

setInterval(changeColors, 200);

})();

//botões de anterior e proximo ep
(function() {
  'use strict';

var currentUrl = window.location.href;

if (currentUrl.includes('https://animefire.plus/animes/')) {
    var buttonContainer = document.querySelector('.vjs-control-bar');

    function loadEpisode(offset) {
        var videoElement = document.getElementById('my-video_html5_api');
        var titleElement = document.querySelector('.sectionVideoEpTitle');
        if (videoElement && titleElement) {
            var videoSrc = videoElement.getAttribute('src');
            var match = videoSrc.match(/\/(\d+)\.mp4$/);
            if (match) {
                var currentEpisode = parseInt(match[1]);
                var newEpisode = currentEpisode + offset;
                var newVideoSrc = videoSrc.replace('/' + currentEpisode + '.mp4', '/' + newEpisode + '.mp4');

                var currentPageUrl = window.location.href;
                var urlParts = currentPageUrl.split('/');
                var currentPageEpisode = parseInt(urlParts[urlParts.length - 1]);
                var newPageEpisode = currentPageEpisode + offset;
                var newPageUrl = currentPageUrl.replace('/' + currentPageEpisode, '/' + newPageEpisode);

                fetch(newPageUrl, { method: 'HEAD' })
                    .then(response => {
                        if (response.ok) {
                            videoElement.setAttribute('src', newVideoSrc);
                            videoElement.load();
                            var titleText = titleElement.textContent;
                            var newTitleText = titleText.replace(/Episódio \d+/, 'Episódio ' + newEpisode);
                            titleElement.textContent = newTitleText;
                            window.history.pushState({}, '', newPageUrl);
                        } else {
                            alert('Episódio não lançado ou não existe', newPageUrl);
                        }
                    })
                    .catch(error => {
                        console.error('Erro ao carregar o episódio:', error);
                    });
            }
        }
    }

    function createButton(imgSrc, clickHandler, id) {
        var button = document.createElement('button');
        button.className = 'vjs-control vjs-button';
        button.type = 'button';
        button.id = id;

        var img = document.createElement('img');
        img.alt = '';
        img.src = imgSrc;
        img.style.width = '15px';
        img.style.height = '15px';

        button.appendChild(img);
        button.addEventListener('click', clickHandler);

        buttonContainer.appendChild(button);
    }

    setTimeout(function() {
        if (!document.getElementById('botaoEpisodioAnterior')) {
            createButton('https://animefire.plus/img/icons/angle-left.png', function() {
                loadEpisode(-1);
            }, 'botaoEpisodioAnterior');
        }
        if (!document.getElementById('botaoProximoEpisodio')) {
            createButton('https://animefire.plus/img/icons/angle-right.png', function() {
                loadEpisode(1);
            }, 'botaoProximoEpisodio');
        }
    }, 5000);
}

})();
